summary: In the great restaurant of life, there are those who eat and those who get eaten. Raimundo Nonato finds an alternative way, a life of his own: he cooks in order to survive and find a place ... See full summary »
cast: João Miguel|Fabiula Nascimento|Babu Santana|Carlo Briani|Zeca Cenovicz|Paulo Miklos|Jean Pierre Noher|Andrea Fumagalli|Betina Belli|Luiz Brambila|Ed Canedo|Adriano Carvalhaes|Altamar Cezar|Helder Clayton|Helder Clayton|Syd Correa|Rodrigo Ferrarini|Lilian Marchiori|Pedro Moreira|Arthur Rocha Sievers|Alexander Sil|Marcel Szymanski|Gustavo Thomann|Tino Viana|Marco Zenni
title: Estômago
